DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - Assess rate screen urinary incontinence ( UI ) woman primary care provider - Identify type screening use primary care provider - Identify barrier screen UI - Identify differences screen rate specialty - Assess whether primary care provider view UI serious medical problem - Assess comfort level primary care provider diagnosis treatment UI - Identify primary care provider ' prefer mode learn UI
DOC.brief_title: Screening Urinary Incontinence Primary Care Providers
DOC.detailed_description: UI common condition whose prevalence expect increase dramatically come decade . Treatment option available improve woman 's health quality life . However , inadequate communication physician patient lead decrease diagnosis treatment . Past study evaluate use screen primary care provider , act gatekeeper healthcare system , clearly demonstrate improvement must make screen system . We propose survey local primary care provider quantify screen rate UI identify barrier successful screening . The information collect survey allow u identify method target education opportunity patient literature questionnaire assist provider patient initiate discussion evaluation UI .
DOC.criteria: All primary care provider Greater Rochester metropolitan area , include : Primary care Medical Doctors ( MD ) , Doctors Osteopathy ( DO ) , Primary care Nurse Practitioners ( NP ) , Physician Assistants ( PA ) Physicians Greater Rochester metropolitan area primary care provider
